alert.note: Alert for White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 5:26PM CDT until July 12 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL WHITE COUNTY... At 525 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Crosby, or near Searcy, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Searcy... Judsonia... Kensett... Higginson... Crosby... Albion... Floyd... Armstrong Springs... Center Hill... This includes US Highway 67 between mile markers 40 and 48. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
